abstract: Readers came up with more suggestions for conquering the onslaught of e-mail.
snippet: Readers came up with more suggestions for conquering the onslaught of e-mail.
lead_paragraph: Last week I wrote a post titled ‘10 Proposals for Fixing the E-Mail Glut’. I presented an array of ideas like limiting the length of an e-mail message, using a smart browsing history and a cold-blooded extermination of the reply-to-all button. The comments generated some great ideas (and a little vitriol), so I wanted to help highlight some of the fun and interesting posts here:

headline.main: Forward These E-Mail Suggestions From Readers
